feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v6.6.3
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Danish translation file  -  by @LovelessCodes in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2957 (b1f98)
  • Keeps the order of json keys. see fixes #2970  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2971 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2970 (1d1f3)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Only shows event stream error when trying to reconnect  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2958 (58103)
  • Coerce log level to lowercase when guessing in structured json  -  by @rm-hull in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2968 (05edd)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v7.0.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Supports swarm mode with stacks and services on remote hosts üôåüèº  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2961 (ba020)
  • Shows offline also on dashboard host list  -  by @amir20 (f644d)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes menu bug when merging logs  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2978 (6acb7)
  • Uses better colors for different container names  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2979 (4c7f2)
  • Fixes padding on mobile  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2980 (aed17)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2975 (1f197)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v7.0.1
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds a simple loader when waiting for logs  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2984 (3b345)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Bug when a new container in service mode is created  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2982 (c268f)
  • Fixes when only one container is in a service  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2983 (89d9e)
  • Improves the loading of stats between page changes  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2985 (beb95)
  • Fixes bug when switching between merged logs was not working  -  by @amir20 (518e3)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies  -  by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2987 (4dd99)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v7.0.2
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes typo. fixes #2991  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2991 (22975)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v7.0.3
entry.content:
üö® Breaking Changes

  • Adds services and stacks to fuzzy search. Note labels will no longer be searchable due to a bug on sorting.  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2999 (3a30c)

   üöÄ Features

  • Disables user select for dates on simple and complex logs. fixes #2967  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2994 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2967 (c2c70)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Aborts fetchings more request when container is changed. fixes #2993  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2995 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/2993 (4829a)
  • Fixes a bug when searching for multiple words in fuzzy popup  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3000 (da62a)
    View changes on GitHub
